title: Armidale: provincial city
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New South Wales - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - Australia
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New South Wales - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cities and towns - Growth - Social aspects
description: Armidale is 300 miles north of Sydney in a district called New England. The film shows how the city owes its prosperity to the land, and includes a sequence on the University of New England.
